snippet: Thursday’s selections from around the Web include an excerpt from a coming book about the origins of Amazon. Plus, a profile of Twitter’s vice president of international market development.
abstract: Thursday’s selections from around the Web include an excerpt from a coming book about the origins of Amazon. Plus, a profile of Twitter’s vice president of international market development.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Amazon as 'The Everything Store,' and Twitter's Ambassador
